author: veithen
msg: An Attachments object created from an input stream behaves very differently than an Attachments object created programmatically. Internally split the code into two different classes, keeping Attachments as a facade.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4247: Introduced ManagementMBeanAssembler as SPI to be able to move spring JMX logic from camel-core to camel-spring.
